briefTitle: An Enhanced Artificial Intelligence Breast MRI Interpretation System
officialTitle: A Comparative Single-centre Study to Evaluate an Enhanced Artificial Intelligence Breast MRI Interpretation System in Women Over 20 With Breast Lesions
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast MRI scans
* MRI examinations undertaken at partner NHS Trust in the UK
* MRI examinations undertaken on the MRI system currently installed at partner NHS Trust site (since 2008)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Incomplete breast MRI datasets
* Breast MRI without lesions
* Breast lesion on MRI not biopsied
